response.original_title: Hyde Park School Room 2, Missouri Commission
response.overview: Four rows of preadolescent children, both boys and girls, are standing in front of a blackboard on which the words "Kansas City, Missouri" can be seen. Each boy and girl has a pair of Indian clubs and for the extent of the film the group demonstrates in unison different exercises, using the clubs. Kansas City, Missouri.
response.title: Hyde Park School Room 2, Missouri Commission
